title: Automated security testing for Software Developers who dont know security!
subtitle: secure your apps and servers through continuous integration
abstract:
i'll show how the average developer (like me) can secure their software and systems by automatically checking for known vulnerabilities and security issues as part of their CI-Toolchain.
The Talk will introduce basic security knowhow, then show how you can use Open Source Frameworks to check for vulnerable dependencies, containers and (web-)APIs in a live demo
